word:
Report of Council About Medical Missionary Work 

           At "Elmshaven," St. Helena, California. April 13, 1902. 


                                 Chapter I. 


                            The Health Food Work 


     Present: Mrs. E. G. White, W. C. White, N. C. McClure, M. E. Cady, Brethren Loper, Boeker, Fulton, Bowen, Haynes, Morian, and others.
